Token.Abstract: US2Validator is a holder for conditions of type US2Condition in a US2ConditionCollection. The validator checks for violation of each condition. Returned will be a collection of violated conditions or nil if the string to check is correct or no condition was added.
Remove all conditions subclassing conditionClass from validation queue.

Parameter.Name: conditionClass
Parameter.Abstract: Remove all conditions which are kind of conditionClass

Token.Abstract: Add condition subclass of US2Condition for validation queue.

Parameter.Name: string
Parameter.Abstract: String to check for all added conditons

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns nil if no conditon was violated or a condition collection of type US2ConditionCollection for each violated conditon
